Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ln65 (Synthetic AMPs, Leu-rich, Lys-rich, UCLL1; Variants: HP1, HP2, HP3, HP4, HP5, HP6, and HP7)
Sequence Information.Source: Obtained via virtual screening and linearization of bp65

Literature.Author: Orsi M, Personne H, Bonvin E, Paschoud T, Olcay B, Hu X, Javor S, Reymond JL. 2024
Literature.Title: Chemical Space for Peptide-based Antimicrobials.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (81.82%) toL5K5WL: 64%; K: 36%. GRAVY: 1.Activity: active against E. coli W3110 (MIC 4 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC 2-4 ug/ml), A. baumannii ATCC19606 (MIC 2-4 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae NCTC418 (MIC 4 ug/ml), and S. aureus COL MRSA (MIC 4 ug/ml).In vitro toxicity: incubation 4 h; minimalum hemolytic concentration (MHC): 125 ug/ml.SAR: incorporation of D-amino acids at different positions (position 2: HP1; positions 1,2: HP2; positions 2,5: HP3; positions 2,4: HP4; positions 1,11: HP5; positions 6,7: HP6; positions 1,2,11: HP7: modulated peptide activity and hemolysis.
